explains: n. 冥想，打坐；沉思，深思；（关于某主题的）感想，沉思录

sentences.en: She found peace through yoga and meditation.
sentences.cn: 她通过瑜伽和冥想找到了宁静。

sentences.en: A study of yoga leads naturally to meditation.
sentences.cn: 习练瑜珈自然地导致冥想。

sentences.en: He was deep in meditation and didn't see me come in.
sentences.cn: 他正在沉思，没有看见我进来。
